column1: RT @SAfridiOfficial: I’ve been feeling unwell since Thursday
column2: my body had been aching badly. I’ve been tested and unfortunately I’m covid p…

column1:
Chris Wallace and his mental midgets were left on the TV when I got home

All I heard was how bad it is that Trump is worried about politics and economics re #coronavirus

And in the next breath, that Trump's opponents are completely right to make it a political issue
